Description: MCBRIDE MUSIC & PAWN 1980's BC RICH WARLOCK, MADE IN USA, BLACK Description: 1980'S BC RICH WARLOCK, MADE IN USA, BLACK, VERY GOOD CONDITION, SOME PLAYWEAR, A FEW MINOR CHIPS/DINGS TO FINISH ON BODY. PICKUPS REPLACED WITH A SEYMOUR DUNCAN TB5 IN THE BRIDGE AND A KENT ARMSTRONG HRO1 IN THE NECK. PLAYS AND SOUNDS ABSOLUTELY KILLER, A BRUTALLY SHREDWORTHY USA MADE BC RICH. MINOR WEAR TO THE GARGANTUAN FRETS, NECK IS SUPER THIN BUT HAS A COMFORTABLE C PROFILE (NOT FLAT LIKE SOME INCREDIBLY THIN SHREDDY NECKS GET), FLOYD ROSE DOES ALL THE DIVEBOMBING YOU COULD WANT AND SNAPS RIGHT BACK IN TUNE. PERFECT FOR YOUR 90'S DEATH METAL WORSHIP BAND. INCLUDES CASE (TWO LATCHES BROKEN ON CASE).
